short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Property Extra browser extension provides listing price history. Currently compatible with rightmove.co.uk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Property Extra browser extension enriches your experience of property listing websites by adding listing price history to your search results. The extension also allows you to like or dislike a property and make notes, all accessible directly from the extension's browser button. The extension is currently compatible with rightmove.co.uk.
